Articles.Content: I'm having trouble with the IVA view. I can't cycle through different kerbals in IVA. I've seen others do it and i've looked through the control lists, but I can't find anything. Please help!
If I remember correctly, once you are in IVA view, you can cycle between kerbals using v.

V should work, yes. 

Also, this question about how to play the game has been moved to Gameplay Questions.
